overview: On a cloudless night in early 1942 the skies above Los Angeles erupted like a volcano when antiaircraft batteries unsuccessfully tried to shoot down one or more unidentified flying objects. The incident has since become a staple of UFO mythology while skeptics claim it was nothing more than misidentified weather balloons. LEMMiNO dives into the available evidence to better understand what makes this case so mysterious.
tagline: The army had opened fire and the city was under attack.
title: The Battle of Los Angeles
